publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 32
ab.l: David́niń aqyllatadoɣon miźmor sandyr bošatylɣan tanmaḥlyɣa javuḥ jazyḥlyɣa.
Sandyr adamɣa ki saɣyšla- masa H anar ǵuńaḥni da bolmasa ǯanynda anyn jaltajlyḥ.
Ki tyjyl- dym uprandylar buvunlarym öḱurḿagim byla har ḱuń.

Ki ḱuń
da keč́a avurlandy üśt́uḿa ḥyššymyj č́uv́uŕuĺd́u śemiźligim aryḥlyḥqa maja qyjasa qurɣaḥ vaḥtlarynda jaznyn hamḿeš́a.
Jazy- ɣymny bildiŕamiń da ǵuńaḥimni jašyrmejmyn ajtamyn š́uḱur et́ajim tanmaḥlarym üč́uń H-ɣa da śeń bošattyj ǵuńaḥiń jazyɣymnyn hamḿeš́a.
Bunun üč́uń tefiĺa et́adir har ḥasid́ saja tapmaḥ üč́uń kĺak vaḥt ančaḥ tašḥyny ullu suvlarnyn anar jet́aĺḿaśĺar.
Śeń syjynč maja tarlyḥtan abraɣyn ḿeni bijańči qutulmaḥnyn quršasynlar ḿeni (.) hamḿeš́a.
Aqyllatamyn śeni da üv́ŕat́amiń śeni bu jol byla ki bargej- syn keńaš́ et́ajim saja ńeni ki ḱord́u ḱoźum.
Bolmajyz at kibik čuval kibik anlamavču juǵań byla da avuzluḥ byla avzun avzuḥ- lama b́erḿaśḱa juvuḥ keĺḿa öźuja.
Ḱop boladyrlar syzlavlar rašaʿɣa da ol išanuvču H-ɣa ševaɣatyndan quršar any.
Bijanijiź H byla da quvanyjyz rastlar da sarnajyz bar t́uź juŕakliĺar.
